fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Writing 1 to this bit enables this system event sender.

fields.name: Enable
fields.description: Writing 1 to this bit enables this system event receiver.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: This field indicates the FUnitId in the received system event response has error; this field is valid when ErrVld is set.

fields.name: SysErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this system error valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an system error.

fields.name: ProtocolTimeoutErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this protocol timeout valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an protocol timeout.

fields.name: EventTimeoutErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this event timeout valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an event timeout.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this error valid bit. When this erorr valid bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an error.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: This field indicates the FUnitId in the received system event message has error; this field is valid when ErrVld is set.

fields.name: EventTimeoutErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this event timeout valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event receiver has detected an event timeout.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this error valid bit. When this erorr valid bit is set, it indicates this system event receiver has detected an error.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: This field indicates the FUnitId in the received system coherency message that has error; this field is valid when ErrVld is set.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this error valid bit. When this erorr valid bit is set, it indicates this system coherency receiver has detected an error.

fields.name: FUnitId
fields.description: This field indicates the FUnitId in the received system coherency response has error; this field is valid when ErrVld is set.

fields.name: SysErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this system error valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an system error.

fields.name: ProtocolTimeoutErr
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this protocol timeout valid bit. When this bit is set, it indicates this system event sender has detected an protocol timeout.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Writing 1 clears this error valid bit. When this erorr valid bit is set, it indicates this system coherency sender has detected an error.

fields.name: ProtocolTimeOutThreshold
fields.description: Protocol time out threshold for System messaging; counts in increments of 1 clock cycles; a value of 0 indicates the timer is disabled.

fields.name: EventTimeOutThreshold
fields.description: Event time out threshold for System messaging; counts in increments of 1 clock cycle; a value of 0 indicates the timer is disabled.

fields.name: Activate
fields.description: Writing 1 to this bit activates system coherency (SysCo assertion). Writing 0 to this bit deactivates system coherency (SysCo deassertion).

fields.name: Connecting
fields.description: A value of 1 indicates CONNECTING to system coherency.

fields.name: Attached
fields.description: A value of 1 indicates the system coherency is ATTACHED, otherwise DETACHED.

fields.name: ErrDetected
fields.description: A value of 1 indicates error is detected. Writing 1 clears this bit.

fields.name: SnoopEnb
fields.description: Snoop Enable bits for snoop agents 0..31. If a bit is set for an agent, snoop messages are enabled for that agent; otherwise, disabled.

fields.name: SnoopEnb
fields.description: Snoop Enable bits for snoop agents 32..63. If a bit is set for an agent, snoop messages are enabled for that agent; otherwise, disabled.

fields.name: SnoopEnb
fields.description: Snoop Enable bits for snoop agents 64..95. If a bit is set for an agent, snoop messages are enabled for that agent; otherwise, disabled.

fields.name: SnoopEnb
fields.description: Snoop Enable bits for snoop agents 96..127. If a bit is set for an agent, snoop messages are enabled for that agent; otherwise, disabled.
